TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BezierSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class BezierSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class BezierSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示兩個點之間繪製的三次方貝茲曲線。

span.span: Represents a cubic Bezier curve drawn between two points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件來儲存物件和其他區段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 由四個點定義三次方貝茲曲線︰ 起點、 結束點 ()，和兩個控制點 (和)。類別不包含曲線開始點的屬性; 它只會定義結束點。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (), and two control points ( and ).The class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point. 曲線開始點是目前的點要加入。The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the to which the is added. 三次方貝茲曲線的兩個控制點作用類似磁鐵，吸引原本為直線的部分，並產生曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點，會影響開頭曲線部分; 第二個控制點， ，會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point, , affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, , affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線並不一定是通過其中一個控制點;每個控制項點是移到本身，而不是透過本身的行那部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是一種物件。A is a type of object. 如需功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

span.span: Geometries Sample

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由四個點定義三次方貝茲曲線︰ 起點、 結束點 (`point3`)，和兩個控制點 (`point1`和`point2`)。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`). 這個方法不會讓您指定的曲線; 的起點在目前的點開始的曲線物件，加入。This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the object to which the is added. 三次方貝茲曲線的兩個控制點作用類似磁鐵，吸引原本為直線的部分，並產生曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點`point1`，會影響開頭曲線部分; 第二個控制點， `point2`，會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線並不一定是通過其中一個控制點;每個控制項點是移到本身，而不是透過本身的行那部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified control points, end point, and stroke option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由四個點定義三次方貝茲曲線︰ 起點、 結束點 (`point3`)，和兩個控制點 (`point1`和`point2`)。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`). 這個方法不會讓您指定的曲線; 的起點在目前的點開始的曲線物件，加入。This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the object to which the is added. 三次方貝茲曲線的兩個控制點作用類似磁鐵，吸引原本為直線的部分，並產生曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點`point1`，會影響開頭曲線部分; 第二個控制點， `point2`，會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線並不一定是通過其中一個控制點;每個控制項點是移到本身，而不是透過本身的行那部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定曲線的第一個控制點。

span.span: Gets or sets the first control point of the curve.
The first control point of the curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方貝茲曲線的兩個控制點作用類似磁鐵，吸引原本為直線的部分，並產生曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點，會影響開頭曲線部分; 第二個控制點， ，會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point, , affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, , affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線並不一定是通過其中一個控制點;每個控制項點是移到本身，而不是透過本身的行那部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
